title: Very Good
review:
Hi this is my honest review after 1day of use 
I was lucky to get this device I day b4 launch. 
This phone is very good looking,  Slim,  it looks like iPhone6 copy. 
Pros:
1) I have never seen the fast finger print sensor. It's lightning fast. Less than a sec I can tell.
2) front Cam is 16mp it's not bad at all. DSLR affect 
3) dedicated memory card slot (32gb)  inbuilt though
4) decent batter life. I cud test only for aday
5)bettr display 1080p at least better than    
 Rs 16900 j7prime LCD display 
6)user friendly UI
7)music is good with headphones on its something new Dirac live music feel
Cons :
1) headphones Jack pin in base very odd place,  ddifficult to hold phone with headphones on. 
2)though processor is Snapdragon 435 I felt it was bit lazy. 
So this is the end,  plz tell me,  reply bck,  if any clarification. Thank u

title: Good selfie camera but not so amazing screen.
review:
I purchased 2 sets for my family. Everything about this phone was almost good until I purchased Micromax evok note(I purchase mobile for all the family members of my huge family).
After comparing both below is my observation:

Pros:
Selfie camera(16MP)
Smooth touch.
Got it at a discounted price at 13,583. Good service by flipkart.
Good looks specially if we don't use cover.
Supports VR due to gyroscope.

Cons:
Screen is a dull, so it's not a fun to use and to watch videos. At this price, at least full hd screen should be there. Biggest drawback.
Need to charge it before the day ends. Battery is 2900 mAH.
Overpriced. May be due to 16MP front camera.

Suggestion: Best for selfie lovers not for mobile lovers.

title: Moderate
review:
It's been a month since I am using this phone.
Was very excited reading it's features, but when received, dealt with great disappointment. 

Oppo phones are known for their camera quality but the rear camera of A57 is extremely poor even it is a 13 MP rear cam. It does not look like even a 5 MP camera.
Front camera is good but could have been way better since it is a 16 MP camera.
Display is also not so good. And battery backup is also not that great.

Only the phone looks good and flipkart gave awesome delivery. 
I would  recommend not to go for this product.

title: Value-for-money
review:
Believe me friend i give only true reviews...
M making it simple ..the phone desihn and look is awesome ..it 5.2inches perfect handy fone..
1. front came 16mp back 13mp. With beaty 4.0 latest, can take upto 50mp pic awesome no one can beat it in aspect of camera.. it has super resollution with bokeh effect in front selfie like dslr...camera is 10/10.
2.triple slot you can use two sims and memory card too expandable memory is 256gb great 10/10.
3. its fingerprint is made by hybrophomic zirconium surface which is scratch proof and water proof awesome speed 0.2sec .you can assign apps to fingerprint too its awesome.
10/10.
4. its comes with 2.5d curved edge and gorilla glass 4 got 10/10.
5. battery 2900 mah in continues video playing 11hrs backup great fone is light weight not heavy like others 10/10.
6. processer is snapdragon 435 whitch is old type but reliable processor no problem in multitasking 8/10.
7.offscreen gestures are awesome,and lifetime antivarus free great 10/10.
8.display 720p i agreed but sufficient 8/10.
overall great product go for it you are getting lifetime software waranty too

title: Fair
review:
If oppo works on it's specification instead of advertising then i can say that this will be the best smartphone at this price....
At a budget of 15,000 there are many more options like redmi note 4, honor 6x, coolpad cool 1....then why buy it???
Many people will say that the highlighting point of this phone is it's camera...so what honor 6x and coolpad cool 1also have a very good camera...

Pros:
Has a good camera

Cons:
Low processor ie SD 430
Only 720p screen
not good battery 2900mah

So guys this is my opinion about this phone....if u r looking for a vry good camera phone then u can buy it
